content: summer is in full swing around here and we re continuing our summer series with a brand new collection of festive chubby bunnies these ones are decked out in their most patriotic outfits and ready for a fun filled fourth of july we re starting off the celebration with an oh-so-cute **bald eagle** that little yellow nose and feather-y ruffles are so perfect every barbeque needs some sweet cool treats and that s where our **watermelon** and **bomb pop** bunny come in and of course we have to end the night with a bang our **firecracker** bunny is ready to put on a sparkling show for everyone pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins pet slicker brush skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet back loops only front loops only finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
